Name: Forest Escape
About the game: Forest Escape is: Run, run away. You have to escape from this dangerous, terrible forest. Danger breathes in your back and it's gaining speed, it will soon catch you up, run faster. Just don't hit the tree! How to play: Use WASD or Arrows Watch out for the trees Beat the high score Forest Escape is: Beautiful graphics Great ambience Eerie sounds Accelerating action
